# Module: tf.contrib.bayesflow

### Module `tf.contrib.bayesflow`

Ops for representing Bayesian computation.

## This package provides classes for Bayesian computation with TensorFlow.

## Members

[`entropy`](../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/entropy) module: Support for Entropy Ops. See ${python/contrib.bayesflow.entropy}.

[`monte_carlo`](../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/monte_carlo) module: Monte Carlo integration and helpers.

[`special_math`](../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/special_math) module: Special Math Ops.

[`stochastic_gradient_estimators`](../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/stochastic_gradient_estimators) module: Stochastic gradient estimators.

[`stochastic_graph`](../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/stochastic_graph) module: Support for Stochastic Computation Graphs.

[`stochastic_tensor`](../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/stochastic_tensor) module: Support for creating Stochastic Tensors.

[`stochastic_variables`](../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/stochastic_variables) module: Custom `get_variable` for stochastic variables.

[`variational_inference`](../../tf/contrib/bayesflow/variational_inference) module: Variational inference.

Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/__init__.py`](https://www.tensorflow.org/code/tensorflow/contrib/bayesflow/__init__.py).
